trait.name: Ice Bite
entries: A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Cold Absorption
entries: Whenever the elemental is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

trait.name: Cold Coat
entries: When a weapon touches the elemental it is coated with a cold sheen for 1 minute. When a weapon is coated it deals an additional 2 ({@damage 1d4}) cold damage. The ice can be attacked (AC 13; 10 hit points; vulnerability to fire; immunity to poison and psychic damage) or can be removed as an action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, plus 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Wall
entries: The elemental shoots a line of freezing water that is 40 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to ice and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is {@condition petrified} until thawed out.
